body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.0 is now available.

What's new in this release:
New version of the Gecko engine.
Partial support for using the Trash on Mac OS X.
Support for path gradients in GdiPlus.
Various MSXML improvements.
Fixes to 64-bit exception handling.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
